model.my_project.stg_customers.name: stg_customers
model.my_project.stg_customers.compiled_code: SELECT id AS customer_id, SPLIT_PART(name, ' ', 1) AS first_name, SPLIT_PART(name, ' ', 2) AS last_name, JSONB_BUILD_OBJECT('email', email, 'full_name', name) AS customer_details FROM my_project.raw.raw_customers

model.my_project.customers.name: customers
model.my_project.customers.compiled_code: WITH customer_events AS (SELECT (payload ->> 'customer_id')::INTEGER AS customer_id, MIN(event_id) AS first_event_id FROM my_project.raw.raw_events GROUP BY 1) SELECT sc.customer_id, sc.customer_details ->> 'full_name' AS full_name, sc.customer_details ->> 'email' AS customer_email, ce.first_event_id FROM my_project.staging.stg_customers sc LEFT JOIN customer_events ce ON sc.customer_id = ce.customer_id

model.my_project.customer_summary.name: customer_summary
model.my_project.customer_summary.compiled_code: SELECT sc.customer_id, sc.customer_details, (re.payload ->> 'device_type') AS device_type, COUNT(re.event_id) AS event_count FROM my_project.staging.stg_customers sc JOIN my_project.raw.raw_events re ON (re.payload ->> 'customer_id')::INTEGER = sc.customer_id GROUP BY sc.customer_id, sc.customer_details, device_type
